item.title: My Sessions at Google Next 2019
item.description: Next week, April 9–11, Google will be hosting this year’s Cloud Next Conference in San Francisco. The conference is already sold out, but there will be a livestream from keynotes and video available shortly after the sessions. This year, we have a lot of content to share, and I have the privilege of presenting in four sessions — and hope to do at least six live demos.
